comments:
Found in WSWB 3.0 M7 + Hyades 3.0 20040303_2236 driver.

Steps to reproduce:
-------------------
1. Start Eclipse using the -consoleLog arg from a fresh install (i.e. let 
Eclipse generate the .config and workspace folders).
2. Select File -> Import... -> Log File -> Next.

The data that gets outputted to the console after you click on the Next button 
is included below.

This data only appears in the console (i.e. does not get outputted in the .log 
file of the workspace), and the resulting Import Log Wizard GUI still came up. 
Also, the osgi BundleException and the InstantiationException were outputted 
all at the same time, so it's not clear if the BundleException is the cause (or 
even related) to this problem.

Please let me know if this is the wrong component that this defect should be 
opened against. Thanks!

Hi all,

It would appear that the InstantiationException is nested within the osgi 
BundleException. The exact same exceptions appeared in the .log file when I was 
investigating something else, and this time they appeared in the .log file...

...
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:389)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:279)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:742)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:581)
Nested exception:
java.lang.InstantiationException: 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.LoggingParsersPlugin
	at java.lang.Class.newInstance3(Class.java:345)
	at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Class.java:304)
...

Not sure if this might have contributed to this exception being thrown (I doubt 
it, but better safe than sorry), but I should also note that the 20040303_2236 
build had 2 failed plug-ins, namely:
org.eclipse.hyades.logtrace.tests
org.eclipse.hyades.test.tests

This is about dependency of plugins in 3.0
adding 
      <import plugin="org.eclipse.core.runtime.compatibility"/>
      <import plugin="org.eclipse.core.runtime"/>
into the plugin.xml of org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers solves the problem

Once again some previous changes were overriten.
Eugene please check all plugins.
